item.title: Top 6 Django Decorators
item.description: ä½œè€…ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»ï¼šPablo Iglesias æ—¶é—´ğŸ•ï¼š2018/06/27 åŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ğŸŒï¼šhttps://www.bedjango.com/blog/top-6-django-decorators/ å£°æ˜ğŸ‘‰ï¼šæœ¬æ–‡ä¸ºè½¬è½½ï¼Œä»…ä½œä¸ºä¸ªäººå­¦ä¹ è®°å½• What is a Decorator? A decorator is the name of one of the most popular design patterns used nowadays, many times we use it without knowing that we are using a design pattern. And what’s so special about this pattern? As we can read at Python Wiki using It is a way of apparently modifying an object’s behavior, by enclosing it inside a decorating object with a similar interface.
